description: 3/8\" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Black Warp. 3/8-1/2\" strips of tan, green, grey & white leather and/or vinyl separated by 2 shots of tan yarn form weft.  Stapled to 11x8.5\" card.  \"H-3\" written on card. (black, tan, green white)
title: Leather Cloth
